data.title: "AMC" ABC Finale: Part Two Quiz
data.meta_description: Here are additional questions from the final ABC produced AMC episode broadcast on September 23rd, 2011. Good luck! All air dates are American.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. During the first segment highlighting numerous pregnancies over the years, one flashback shown was when Natalie delivered Janet's daughter, Amanda.

Answer: True

As Amanda currently was on the canvas, it only was fair that "AMC" include her in their montage honoring classic births from the soap's history. In the clip, Janet had just held Natalie hostage right as she went into labor. Natalie reluctantly agreed to help bring Janet's newborn daughter, Amanda, into the world.

2. Near the beginning of the episode, Zach, Kendall, Erica, Bianca and who else played with their kids at Zach and Kendall's place?

Answer: Marissa Tasker

In a sweet moment, Zach, Kendall, Bianca, Marissa, Erica and Bianca enjoyed some quality time with Miranda, Gabrielle, Ian, Spike and AJ. From one particular instance, Erica and Kendall spoke in private as they smiled on at their beautiful family. Zach was seen lifting Spike into the air on one occasion.

3. Which couple was at the park in their first scene?

Answer: Ryan and Greenlee

Ryan and Greenlee took Emma for a nice outing held in the lovely Pine Valley Park where trees brightly lit up, the sun glistened atop all the grassy plains and the leaves added a nice quality touch. Both of them watched as Emma raced towards them. All three were seen sharing a big family hug together.

4. Which couple ran into JR at the airport?

Answer: Tad and Dixie

As JR approached the gate to board his flight, Tad and Dixie tracked him down for a chat about Stuart being alive. During that talk, JR expressed how disappointed he was in Dixie after admitting he felt more betrayed by her than his own father. Dixie cried out tears as JR ran off but Tad comforted her.

5. Who said he had a party to crash?

Answer: JR Chandler

Right before boarding his plane, JR contemplated his present woes in life when an employee informed him his private jet was ready to take off. JR instructed him to ground the flight since he wanted to crash the party at Chandler Mansion. The employee ran this by JR's pilot.

6. Jack spoke with Krystal at her restaurant about his troubles with Erica.

Answer: True

Jack begun this episode commiserating with his good friend, Krystal, over at her restaurant. He confirmed to her that his plans to call it quits with Erica for good would arise soon, despite their being together on and off for over twenty years. Jack and Erica had disagreements over Erica's ambition to act in a movie based off a book she recently published.

7. Liza told David that which person bailed him out of jail?

Answer: Adam Chandler

Liza arrived at the police station to give David an update about his court case. Apparently, Adam contacted the judge to have David released on bail as a token of his appreciation for David saving Stuart's life. David, along with Cara, got ecstatic over this news.

8. Which couple revealed that they had reconciled while at the party?

Answer: Scott and Madison

In one scene, Ryan and Greenlee watched as Scott and Madison shared a close moment. Greenlee said she did not want to take any credit for the two having gotten back together. However, Madison said she owed Greenlee a little bit of thanks since she likely would not have ever met Scott had she not dealt with her. Scott and Madison then locked lips as they celebrated their reconciliation.

9. Opal arrived with which person at the party?

Answer: Erica Kane

Erica and Opal arrived a little late at Adam's party when both gazed upon Krystal flirting with Jack. Opal warned Erica not to let Krystal get the best of her. However, Erica simply reminded Opal of who she was and that someone like Krystal was not a threat to her.

10. Who fired a gun in the final scene?

Answer: JR Chandler

JR scrambled inside the tunnels of Chandler Mansion unbeknownst to anyone at the party. He pulled out a gun from his satchel to aim at Bianca and Marissa. In the final scene, JR fired off one bullet just as Erica approached Jack. The finale episode then concluded without revealing who fell victim to the bullet.

Source: Author CAGuy0206

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor Gamemaster1967 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
